name: 【SP #10】流域｜River's Realm
description:
【夢境故事】

踏入這個秘境，彷彿穿梭在一片充滿魔幻色彩的流域之中，壯闊的山脈巍然屹立於身後。而在這潺潺流淌的溪流中，一股神秘的力量散發著迷人的氛圍，讓人不由自主地被吸引。

-

【Dream Story】

Stepping into this secret realm, it felt as though I was journeying through a realm of enchantment, with magical hues saturating the surrounding landscape. Majestic mountains stood tall and imposing behind me, while a gentle stream flowed by, imbued with an enigmatic power that exuded an irresistible allure.
